description.narrative: The Discovery Project is a unique public-private partnership between Discovery Learning Alliance and the UK Department for International Development (DFID) to improve education opportunities for marginalized girls, and boys, in Sub-Saharan Africa. The Discovery Girls Project is empowering teachers and families of marginalized children to raise the quality of education and prioritize access for all children. About Discovery Learning Alliance Discovery Learning Alliance is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization using the power of media to transform education and improve lives in under-resourced schools and communities around the world. Launched by Discovery Communications in 1997, we are opening new doors to learning in 16 countries reaching millions through schools and millions more through broadcast television and mass media initiatives in the developing world. Leveraging Discovery’s world-class programming and education expertise, Discovery Learning Alliance extends Discovery Communications’ mission to help people satisfy their curiosity.

mailing-address.narrative: One Discover Place Silver Spring, MD 20910 USA
